entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
